languages.text: "Что ж, твоя светлость {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}, шерин, бич души моей, но спаситель{mf||ница} плоти. Загнала нас нелегкая в самое паскудное местечко в галактике — родненький дом {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}друкарских{/g} ублюдков, откуда, как мне известно, никто не возвращается. Ни живым, ни мертвым, ни по частям". {n}Суровая мрачность и изможденное тело совсем не подходят той Джай Хейдари, которую вы знали. Перед вами бывалый солдат, жесткий и прямолинейный.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Что ж, твоя светлость {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}, шерин, бич души моей, но спаситель{mf||ница} плоти. Загнала нас нелегкая в самое паскудное местечко в галактике — родненький дом {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}друкарских{/g} ублюдков, откуда, как мне известно, никто не возвращается. Ни живым, ни мертвым, ни по частям". {n}Суровая мрачность и изможденное тело совсем не подходят той Джай Хейдари, которую вы знали. Перед вами бывалый солдат, жесткий и прямолинейный.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Let's see, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, shereen, bane of my soul and saviour of my flesh. Cruel fate has driven us straight into the foulest corner of the galaxy, home sweet home to the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} scum. I have it on good authority that no one leaves this place. Not alive, not dead, not even in pieces." {n}The grim seriousness and the thin, haggard body cannot belong to the Jae Heydari that you know. Before you stands a soldier, tough and no-nonsense.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Что ж, твоя светлость {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}, шерин, бич души моей, но спаситель{mf||ница} плоти. Загнала нас нелегкая в самое паскудное местечко в галактике — родненький дом {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}друкарских{/g} ублюдков, откуда, как мне известно, никто не возвращается. Ни живым, ни мертвым, ни по частям". {n}Суровая мрачность и изможденное тело совсем не подходят той Джай Хейдари, которую вы знали. Перед вами бывалый солдат, жесткий и прямолинейный.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Let's see, your {mf|lordship|ladyship}, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, shereen, the bane of my soul and the saviour of my flesh. Cruel fate drove us straight into the foulest place in the galaxy, the cosy nest of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} bastards. I have it on good authority that no one can leave it, whether alive or dead or in pieces." {n}The grim seriousness and the thin, haggard body cannot belong to the Jae Heydari that you know. Before you stands an accomplished, tough and straightforward soldier.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Let's see, your {mf|lordship|ladyship}, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, shereen, the bane of my soul and the saviour of my flesh. Cruel fate drove us straight into the foulest place in the galaxy, the cosy nest of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} bastards. I have it on good authority that no one can leave it, whether alive or dead or in pieces." {n}The grim seriousness and the thin, haggard body cannot belong to the Jae Heydari that you know. Before you stands an accomplished, tough and straightforward soldier.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Let's see, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, shereen, bane of my soul and saviour of my flesh. Cruel fate has driven us straight into the foulest corner of the galaxy, home sweet home to the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} scum. I have it on good authority that no one leaves this place. Not alive, not dead, not even in pieces." {n}The grim seriousness and the thin, haggard body cannot belong to the Jae Heydari that you know. Before you stands a soldier, tough and no-nonsense.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “让我看看是谁来了，是我亲爱的{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}大人，我灵魂的祸根与肉体的救星。残酷的命运将我们赶到了整个银河系最邪恶的角落，那些{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}黑暗灵族{/g}渣滓的甜蜜故乡。据我所知，没有任何人能离开这个地方，无论是活人、死人，还是被切成碎块的人。”{n}婕伊的身体瘦弱而憔悴，以严肃的态度对你说着。你眼前的这个人并不是你熟知的婕伊·海达利，而是一名士兵，坚韧不拔，不苟言笑。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Let's see, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, shereen, bane of my soul and saviour of my flesh. Cruel fate has driven us straight into the foulest corner of the galaxy, home sweet home to the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} scum. I have it on good authority that no one leaves this place. Not alive, not dead, not even in pieces." {n}The grim seriousness and the thin, haggard body cannot belong to the Jae Heydari that you know. Before you stands a soldier, tough and no-nonsense.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “让我看看是谁来了，是我亲爱的{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}大人，我灵魂的祸根与肉体的救星。残酷的命运将我们赶到了整个银河系最邪恶的角落，那些{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}黑暗灵族{/g}渣滓的甜蜜故乡。据我所知，没有任何人能离开这个地方，无论是活人、死人，还是被切成碎块的人。”{n}婕伊的身体瘦弱而憔悴，以严肃的态度对你说着。你眼前的这个人并不是你熟知的婕伊·海达利，而是一名士兵，坚韧不拔，不苟言笑。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "Let's see, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} Rogue Trader, shereen, bane of my soul and saviour of my flesh. Cruel fate has driven us straight into the foulest corner of the galaxy, home sweet home to the Drukhari scum. I have it on good authority that no one leaves this place. Not alive, not dead, not even in pieces." {n}The grim seriousness and the thin, haggard body cannot belong to the Jae Heydari that you know. Before you stands a soldier, tough and no-nonsense.{/n}

languages.text: «Deje que le explique, mi{mf|lord|lady} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}, shereen, castigo de mi alma y salvador{mf||a} de mi carne. El cruel destino nos ha llevado directamente al rincón más terrible de la galaxia, el dulce hogar de la escoria {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}. Sé a ciencia cierta que nadie sale de aquí. Ni vivo, ni muerto ni a cachitos». {n}Esa seriedad fúnebre y ese cuerpo delgado y macilento no pueden pertenecer a la Jae Heydari que conoces. Frente a ti se encuentra una soldado, dura y juiciosa.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Let's see, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, shereen, bane of my soul and saviour of my flesh. Cruel fate has driven us straight into the foulest corner of the galaxy, home sweet home to the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} scum. I have it on good authority that no one leaves this place. Not alive, not dead, not even in pieces." {n}The grim seriousness and the thin, haggard body cannot belong to the Jae Heydari that you know. Before you stands a soldier, tough and no-nonsense.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Deje que le explique, mi{mf|lord|lady} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}, shereen, castigo de mi alma y salvador{mf||a} de mi carne. El cruel destino nos ha llevado directamente al rincón más terrible de la galaxia, el dulce hogar de la escoria {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}. Sé a ciencia cierta que nadie sale de aquí. Ni vivo, ni muerto ni a cachitos». {n}Esa seriedad fúnebre y ese cuerpo delgado y macilento no pueden pertenecer a la Jae Heydari que conoces. Frente a ti se encuentra una soldado, dura y juiciosa.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「えっと、{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}閣下、我が魂の災禍にして、肉体の救世主。残酷な運命が我々を銀河の片隅に追いやった。{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}デュカーリ{/g}のクズどもの故郷にね。確かな筋から聞いた話だけど、誰もここから出てはいくことはできないんだ。生きていても、死んでいても、バラバラになってもね」{n}その険しい表情と痩せこけた体は、あなたが知っているジェイ・ヘイダリのものとは思えない。あなたの目の前に立っているのは、タフで冗談を言わない兵士だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Let's see, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, shereen, bane of my soul and saviour of my flesh. Cruel fate has driven us straight into the foulest corner of the galaxy, home sweet home to the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} scum. I have it on good authority that no one leaves this place. Not alive, not dead, not even in pieces." {n}The grim seriousness and the thin, haggard body cannot belong to the Jae Heydari that you know. Before you stands a soldier, tough and no-nonsense.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「えっと、{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}閣下、我が魂の災禍にして、肉体の救世主。残酷な運命が我々を銀河の片隅に追いやった。{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}デュカーリ{/g}のクズどもの故郷にね。確かな筋から聞いた話だけど、誰もここから出てはいくことはできないんだ。生きていても、死んでいても、バラバラになってもね」{n}その険しい表情と痩せこけた体は、あなたが知っているジェイ・ヘイダリのものとは思えない。あなたの目の前に立っているのは、タフで冗談を言わない兵士だ。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Mal sehen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}{/g}, Shereen, Geißel meiner Seele und {mf|Retter|Retterin} meines Fleischs. Das Grausame Schicksal hat uns geradewegs in die schändlichste Ecke der Galaxie getrieben, ins traute Heim des {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}-Abschaums. Ich weiß aus guter Quelle, dass niemand hier je wieder wegkommt. Weder lebendig noch tot, ja nicht einmal in kleinen Stücken." {n}Der düstere Ernst und der dünne, ausgemergelte Körper können nicht der Jae Heydari gehören, die du kennst. Vor dir steht eine Soldatin, tough und nüchtern.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Let's see, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, shereen, bane of my soul and saviour of my flesh. Cruel fate has driven us straight into the foulest corner of the galaxy, home sweet home to the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} scum. I have it on good authority that no one leaves this place. Not alive, not dead, not even in pieces." {n}The grim seriousness and the thin, haggard body cannot belong to the Jae Heydari that you know. Before you stands a soldier, tough and no-nonsense.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Mal sehen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}{/g}, Shereen, Geißel meiner Seele und {mf|Retter|Retterin} meines Fleischs. Das Grausame Schicksal hat uns geradewegs in die schändlichste Ecke der Galaxie getrieben, ins traute Heim des {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}-Abschaums. Ich weiß aus guter Quelle, dass niemand hier je wieder wegkommt. Weder lebendig noch tot, ja nicht einmal in kleinen Stücken." {n}Der düstere Ernst und der dünne, ausgemergelte Körper können nicht der Jae Heydari gehören, die du kennst. Vor dir steht eine Soldatin, tough und nüchtern.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Résumons la situation, Votre Seigneurie {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}{/g}, shereen, fléau de mon âme et {mf|sauveur|sauveuse} de ma chair. La main cruelle du destin nous a {mf|menés|menées} tout droit dans le coin le plus infâme de la galaxie : le territoire de ces vermines de {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukharis{/g}. Je sais de source sûre que personne ne quitte cet endroit. Ni vivant, ni mort, ni même en morceaux. » {n}Ce ton sérieux ne peut pas appartenir à la Jae Heydari que vous connaissez, pas plus que ce corps maigre et ces traits tirés. Devant vous se tient un soldat, coriace et pragmatique.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Let's see, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, shereen, bane of my soul and saviour of my flesh. Cruel fate has driven us straight into the foulest corner of the galaxy, home sweet home to the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} scum. I have it on good authority that no one leaves this place. Not alive, not dead, not even in pieces." {n}The grim seriousness and the thin, haggard body cannot belong to the Jae Heydari that you know. Before you stands a soldier, tough and no-nonsense.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Résumons la situation, Votre Seigneurie {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}{/g}, shereen, fléau de mon âme et {mf|sauveur|sauveuse} de ma chair. La main cruelle du destin nous a {mf|menés|menées} tout droit dans le coin le plus infâme de la galaxie : le territoire de ces vermines de {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukharis{/g}. Je sais de source sûre que personne ne quitte cet endroit. Ni vivant, ni mort, ni même en morceaux. » {n}Ce ton sérieux ne peut pas appartenir à la Jae Heydari que vous connaissez, pas plus que ce corps maigre et ces traits tirés. Devant vous se tient un soldat, coriace et pragmatique.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Şöyle bir özet geçelim şirinim {mf|Lord|Leydi} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} Hazretleri, ruhumun tasası, bedenimin kurtarıcısı. Zalim kader bizi galaksinin en tekinsiz köşelerine, aşağılık {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukharilerin{/g} evceğizine yolladı. Buradan kimsenin kaçamadığını gayet iyi biliyorum. Ne canlı, ne ölü, ne de paramparça." {n}Bu katı ciddiyet ve ince, yabani beden; tanıdığın Jae Heydari'ye ait değil. Karşında sert ve profesyonel bir asker var.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Let's see, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, shereen, bane of my soul and saviour of my flesh. Cruel fate has driven us straight into the foulest corner of the galaxy, home sweet home to the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} scum. I have it on good authority that no one leaves this place. Not alive, not dead, not even in pieces." {n}The grim seriousness and the thin, haggard body cannot belong to the Jae Heydari that you know. Before you stands a soldier, tough and no-nonsense.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Şöyle bir özet geçelim {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri şirinim, ruhumun tasası, bedenimin kurtarıcısı. Zalim kader bizi galaksinin en tekinsiz köşelerine, {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} pisliklerinin evleri güzel evlerine yolladı. Buradan kimsenin kaçamadığını gayet iyi biliyorum. Ne canlı, ne ölü, ne de paramparça hâlde." {n}Bu katı ciddiyet ve ince, yabani beden, senin tanıdığın Jae Heydari'ye ait olamaz. Önündeki kişi bir asker. Sert ve profesyonel.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
